text: Idi bersiva komale (Ibrahim ji bona wi ra) hey eva buye: (ji hev ra aha) gotine: “Hun (geli me!) Ibrahim bikujin, yann ji ewi bisewitinin.” Idi (ji pisti ku ewan Ibrahin avete agir) Yezdan ewi ji agir fereste kiriye. Bi rasti ji bona komaleki ku bawer dikin (di van buyeran da) beraten (derhoze) hene
